name: customers_expansion_managed
description:
The total number of existing Managed customers with a Closed Won Renew or Expand Opportunity  where the expected Delta ARR is positive (> 0), indicating a positive change in ARR (Annual Recurring Revenue)  during a given time period. This metric is intended to be reported at the fiscal-quarter-grain or higher, 
therefore, dimension values replace native time grains in this metric definition.
